rules_text:
When General Tsabo Tavoc enters the battlefield, destroy target legendary permanent you don't control.
Whenever one or more creatures you don't control die, you may pay 3 life. If you do, choose one –
• Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
• Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
